Grading Basis: Satisfactory/Unsatisfactory


Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required


All EMPH courses are online and asynchronous with the exception of online synchronous sessions on opening weekend (5/21-5/23) and Closing Day (8/6).
course_description: This course is intended to integrate studentÂ¿s previous coursework with a focus on developing a community intervention or program. Students will develop a comprehensive program plan drawing upon previous coursework and experience in program planning, needs assessment, intervention design, program implementation and evaluation.  This course is one of the integrative experience options for Prevention Science students will help build a portfolio that illustrates skilles in program planning strategies.
prerequisites: PRS 500D and PRS 561D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
